text: Parassala railway station (Code: PASA) is a railway station in Thiruvananthapuram District, Kerala and falls under the Thiruvananthapuram railway division of the Southern Railway Zone, Indian Railways. It is the southernmost Railway Station in Kerala and simultaneously marks the beginning of Kanyakumari district, Tamil Nadu at Kaliyakkavila, therefore serving both Kerala and Tamil Nadu border areas of the region. Category:Railway stations in Thiruvananthapuram district Category:Thiruvananthapuram railway division
title: Parassala railway station
